duties_responsibilities.duty: Manages the daily functions of the assigned team while maintaining standards of excellence for processes, methods, and personnel.
Ensures the goals and needs of the departments, company, and customers are consistently met.
Oversees AP, AR, Billing, and Compliance.
Identifies opportunities to streamline processes to ensure the accuracy of timelines and makes recommendations to VP of Finance.
Manages the preparation of monthly and annual GAAP Financial Statements.
Participates in meetings and work groups to integrate activities, communicate issues, obtain approvals, and resolve problems.
Coordinates financial audits and provides recommendations for procedural improvements.
Coordinates financial audits and provides recommendations for procedural improvements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or related field (Master's preferred)
